definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
tube/cylinder/to encase in sth cylindrical (such as hands in sleeves etc)

sentences.english: Check the building for cracks and damage, particularly around chimneys and masonry walls.
sentences.chinese: 檢查建築是否有裂縫和損壞，尤其是煙筒與磚牆周圍。

sentences.english: Simplicity Chow produced a miniature hookah and offered it to Benevolence.
sentences.chinese: 趙樸齋取一支水煙筒送上善卿。

sentences.english: Cracks in chimneys can be the cause of a fire years later.
sentences.chinese: 那些煙筒的裂縫甚至可能在幾年後導致一場火災。

sentences.english: She again put her short black pipe to her lips, and renewed her smoking with vigour.
sentences.chinese: 她再次把那杆黑色的短煙筒放進嘴裏，使勁吸了起來。

sentences.english: He dreams of scaffolds as he smokes his hookah pipe.
sentences.chinese: 他抽起水煙筒，夢想着斷頭臺。

sentences.english: Water pipe In Guangxi province, so many people are the pumping smokers.
sentences.chinese: 水煙筒》在廣西見到最多的就是抽這種水煙的人。

sentences.english: China has become the world's factory, but also its smokestack.
sentences.chinese: 中國已經變成世界工廠，但它也變成了世界的煙筒。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses a chimney of a warming coal stove.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型公開了一種取暖煤爐的煙筒。

sentences.english: Funnel shall be installed above the engine casing.
sentences.chinese: 煙筒應該安裝在機艙頂棚上。

sentences.english: An air tank and a chimney that was removed to a circumference are left.
sentences.chinese: 機車的周圍放在空氣筒，煙筒等等。

sentences.english: At night, the house sang us quiet songs through the chimneys as we fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 到了晚上，房間會用煙筒輕輕地哼着歌伴我們入睡。

definition: Dacun township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
to pile up like a mountain (idiom)/a mountain of (paperwork etc)/a large number of sth
body weary, strength exhausted (idiom); extremely tired/spent
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
